title: wine_Gamache_2010_Reserve_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))
text:
Unnamed: 0: 30587.
country: US.
description: For the first time this reserve-level Gamache Cabernet includes grapes from the Ciel du Cheval vineyard as well as both the Champoux and estate vineyards. It's 100% varietal, drawing upon equal portions of fruit from all three, and it's a magnificent combination. Powerful, sleek, dense and textural, the wine explodes from the glass, muscular and thick with black fruits and ripe tannins. Highlights of black tea, espresso and smoke add layers of interest to a lengthy finish..
designation: Reserve.
points: 93.
price: 55.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Columbia Valley (WA).
